name: All Star Soccer
description:
Back of Jewel Case - Playstation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

At last, the ultimate challenge for all soccer fans! Your chance to build your perfect dream team! Not only does All Star Soccer let you dictate the tactics, formation and playing style of your team, but actually lets you create custom players with just the right mix of skill, speed and intelligence. This fantastic mix of ultra realistic soccer with a radical twist is completed by a hilarious mix of commentaries by impressionist Alistair McGowan.

releases.country: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
